title: François Bayrou ousted as French PM after losing confidence vote | France | The Guardian
snippet: François Bayrou has been ousted ... plunging France into a political crisis. Bayrou, 74, will hand his resignation to Emmanuel Macron, his longterm centrist ally, on Tuesday morning....

title: French Prime Minister Bayrou hands in resignation
snippet: French Prime Minister François Bayrou submitted his resignation to President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday, September 9, after France's parliament ousted the government in a confidence vote on Monday that Bayrou himself had called.

title: French Premier Bayrou submits resignation to Macron after confidence vote defeat
snippet: Bayrou, who had been in office since December 2024, tendered his resignation immediately after the National Assembly voted against his government in a confidence motion, making him the fourth French premier to be forced out since early 2024.

title: France's prime minister is ousted as the nation drifts into turmoil | AP News
